us.radiri.merc.gfx

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.radiri.merc.gfx.Shader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Resource

    public class Shader
extends Object
implements Resource
    An object version of shaders. Does all of the tedious stuff for you and lets you use the shader easily.
    Author:
    wessles, opiop65

      • getShader

        public static Shader getShader(int vert,
               int frag)
        Returns:
        A shader based off of the two program objects vert and frag.

      • getShader

        public static Shader getShader(InputStream vin,
               InputStream fin)
        Parameters:
        vin - The vertex shader's file
        fin - The fragment shader's file.
        Returns:
        A shader based off of the files in vin and fin.

      • getShader

        public static Shader getShader(String vsrc,
               String fsrc)
        Parameters:
        vsrc - The source of the vertex shader.
        fsrc - The source of the fragment shader.
        Returns:
        A shader based off of the sources vsrc and fsrc.

      • getShader

        public static Shader getShader(InputStream src,
               int type)
        Parameters:
        src - The stream to the source file.
        type - The type of shader (the other half will use the MERCury default shader).
        Returns:
        A shader based off of the stream src, of the type type.

      • getShader

        public static Shader getShader(String src,
               int type)
        Parameters:
        src - The source of the shader.
        type - The type of shader (the other half will use the MERCury default shader).
        Returns:
        A shader based off of the src of the type type.

      • getDefaultShader

        public static Shader getDefaultShader()
        The default shader for MERCury (not to be confused with shader 0).
